projects.name: Countries App
projects.description: Countries App is a app about all the countires on the planet and you can search between them and find your country then you can click on each country you want and see more details about that country

projects.name: Space Travellers
projects.description: Space Travellers' Hub is a single-page application (SPA) built with React that uses real-time data from the SpaceX API. Users can book rockets and join selected space missions, and the selected services are displayed on the user's profile page

projects.name: Book store
projects.description: Bookstore is a web-base app for adding your favorite books and store them in the browser's local-storage.

projects.name: Logseq Marketplace
projects.description: Logseq Marketplace is a web-base app for finding your favorite plugins and themes for your personal Logseq environment

projects.name: Mathmagician
projects.description: Mathmagician is a simple calculator and text generator using api
